item.description:
Come join us for a great time candlepin Glow bowling. It's fun, inexpensive, and great exercise too.

We will be heading out to Academy Lanes in Bradford MA for a night of music, bowling, and lots of fun and laughter.

Academy Lanes is one of the biggest Candelpin Centers in the world with 48 Lanes, Video & Pinball Arcade, ATM on Site, Beer/Wine & snacks, Keno & Lottery available. There is also a Pizza shop next door.

For those who do not know what Glow Bowling is, here is an overview:
GLOW Bowling is glow-in-the-dark bowling with a dance club atmosphere that rocks the center with a state-of-the-art sound system. They play Top 40 music, add to that strobe lights, disco lights and rope lights, it really is the place to be to rock'n'roll!

Academy Lanes is located in Bradford, Mass., across the Merrimack River from Haverhill, Mass. Easy to reach by taking Interstate 495 to the Route 125 Cut-off (Exit 48), or Route 125 itself from either North Andover or Haverhill.

Pricing for this event: $22.00 hr, $12.00 1/2 hour per lane (max 6 ppl per lane). Shoe Rental is $1.75

So come on down and rock n bowl this place with us.

Hope to see you all at the Academy
item.name: Glow Bowling at Academy Lanes
